title: UCL Responds to Jewish Chronicle on Marxism 2024 Festival
message:
University College LondonIn response to an article published by the Jewish Chronicle on Thursday, July 18th, about alleged comments made at the recent Marxism 2024 festival, we are publishing the following statement, outlining our total and utter condemnation of antisemitism.
A UCL spokesperson said: "We are horrified by these reports of appalling and unacceptable comments made at the Marxism Festival and have reported these to the police.
We utterly condemn all forms of antisemitism and have made clear to our community that this will not be tolerated at UCL.
"We are urgently investigating a number of incidents that allegedly took place at the Marxism Festival on our property in breach of these terms.
"We urge anyone who experiences or witnesses any form of racism or other unacceptable behaviour at the university to report this to us."
event_breakdown: UCL launches investigation into antisemitism at recent Marxism festival
